about.title: Innovating for a Sustainable Future
about.description1: We are immersed in an ambitious project that transcends lines of code and user interfaces. We aim to develop an advanced system for the efficient control of water and electricity consumption, using technology as a key pillar to promote sustainable and responsible practices.
about.description2: Additionally, as part of our vision for innovation, we will incorporate elements of smart buildings, exploring home automation in a classroom. This approach will allow us not only to optimize resource use but also to create more connected, comfortable, and efficient spaces aligned with future needs.
about.description3: We are convinced that technology is not just a tool, but a catalyst for generating awareness and acting responsibly towards our planet. Together, we can make a difference.

functions.name: Raspberry Pi
functions.description: The brain of the system. It collects and analyzes consumption data, generating real-time reports to optimize resource use.
functions.detail: It is a compact, low-power microcomputer, ideal for automation projects, monitoring, and programming learning.

functions.name: Camera
functions.description: Captures images of the meters, allowing precise tracking of consumption.
functions.detail: 5MP, 1080P sensor compatible with Raspberry Pi, with night vision and a wide-angle fisheye lens.

functions.name: Monitors
functions.description: Displays real-time data to raise awareness and promote responsible practices.
functions.detail: 24" monitors with HDMI, VGA, and DisplayPort, designed for low power consumption and high durability.

functions.name: Flow Sensor
functions.description: Measures the amount of water passing through it with an internal rotor.
functions.detail: Measures the flow of liquids with an internal rotor that generates pulses proportional to the flow.

functions.name: Current Sensor
functions.description: Allows measuring alternating current without direct contact with the circuit.
functions.detail: Measures alternating current without direct contact, ideal for energy monitoring and control of electricity consumption.

functions.name: Module
functions.description: Designed to work with Raspberry Pi, measuring current and temperature.
functions.detail: Allows real-time recording of current and temperature values, ideal for energy management.

us.title: Welcome to our digital space!
us.parragraph: We are a group of students from the Higher Vocational Course in Multi-Platform Application Development, united by the determination to make a difference. At the heart of our work is an innovative project that reflects our technical skills and our dedication to creating a positive impact on the world around us. In our group, we don't just work together; we create an environment where collaboration thrives. With every step we take, we look towards a future full of possibilities. We know that challenges are inevitable, but we are ready to face them with determination.
us.text: Thank you for being part of this journey with us.
us.small-text2: Commitment and awareness of the environment

smartHomes.title: Smart Homes
smartHomes.description: Smart homes are transforming the way we consume resources like light and water. Our IoT system combines advanced sensors, artificial intelligence, and an easy-to-use interface to ensure residents have full control over their energy consumption. Through the mobile app, users can schedule lights, monitor water usage in real-time, and receive personalized recommendations based on their consumption history. Additionally, smart sensors detect daily habits to automatically adjust the system. For example, if they detect the house is empty, they turn off the lights and adjust the thermostat, preventing waste. This not only contributes to economic savings but also minimizes environmental impact.
smartHomes.benefit1: 25-40% savings on water and electricity bills.
smartHomes.benefit2: Remote control of devices like lights and thermostats.
smartHomes.benefit3: Alerts in case of water leaks or excessive use.

commercialBuildings.title: Commercial Buildings
commercialBuildings.description: Smart commercial buildings are revolutionizing resource management by integrating IoT technology for efficient control of light and water. Our system allows for the automation of lighting and climate control, adjusting according to space occupancy and environmental conditions. This not only optimizes energy consumption but also improves the comfort of employees and visitors. Through a centralized platform, administrators can monitor water and energy consumption in real-time, receive alerts of potential anomalies, and apply customized settings to maximize operational efficiency.
commercialBuildings.benefit1: 30-50% reduction in energy and water costs.
commercialBuildings.benefit2: Automation of lighting and climate control based on occupancy.
commercialBuildings.benefit3: Real-time monitoring with alerts for water leaks or abnormal energy use.

publicSpaces.title: Sustainable Public Spaces
publicSpaces.description: Public spaces, such as parks, plazas, and recreational areas, can greatly benefit from smart resource management systems. Our IoT system optimizes public lighting by adjusting its intensity according to the time of day and the presence of people, improving safety and reducing energy consumption. Additionally, irrigation systems are automatically controlled considering climatic factors such as soil moisture and weather forecasts, preventing water waste and ensuring more responsible use of natural resources.
publicSpaces.benefit1: Up to 40% savings in water consumption thanks to smart irrigation adapted to climatic conditions.
publicSpaces.benefit2: Significant cost reduction in public lighting by automatically adjusting light intensity.
publicSpaces.benefit3: Improved public safety by activating lights in response to the presence of people in specific areas.
